contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Hawkeye|hawkeye}} '''Hawkeye''' may refer to: {{tocright}} == Geography == * A nickname for the state of [[Iowa]] * [[Hawkeye, Iowa]] == Fiction and entertainment == * [[Natty Bumppo]] or Hawkeye, a character in James Fenimore Cooper's ''The Last of the Mohicans'' ** ''[[Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans]]'', a 1957 TV series ** [[Hawkeye (TV series)|''Hawkeye'' (TV series)]], a 1994 TV series * [[Hawkeye (comics)]], a fictional Marvel Comics superhero ** [[Hawkeye (Kate Bishop)]], the second Hawkeye in the Marvel universe ** [[Bullseye (comics)]] a supervillain in Marvel Comics who assumed the Hawkeye identity for a time * [[Hawkeye Pierce]], a character in the ''M* A* S* H'' franchise ** [[Hawkeye (M*A*S*H)|"Hawkeye" (''M* A* S* H'' episode)]] * [[Hawkeye (Seiken Densetsu 3)|Hawkeye (''Seiken Densetsu 3'')]], a character in ''Seiken Densetsu 3'' * [[Dracule "Hawkeye" Mihawk]], a character in ''One Piece'' * [[Riza Hawkeye]], a character in ''Fullmetal Alchemist'' * "Hawkeye", an instrumental on the 1985 Alan Parsons Project album ''[[Vulture Culture]]'' * ''Hawkeye'', a 1988 side-ways scrolling platform shoot'em'up * Hawkeye as a SAM vehicle in ''[[Military Madness: Nectaris]]'' * [[Hawkeye (DC Comics)]], a Henchman in the 1960s ''Batman'' series == Other uses == * [[The Hawkeye Initiative]], a tumblr page that places the fictional comic character Hawkeye in poses held by female characters * ''[[The Hawk Eye]]'', a newspaper in Burlington, Iowa * [[E-2 Hawkeye|E-2 ''Hawkeye'']], an aircraft * [[Hawkeye (brand)]], a professional videocassette brand * [[Hawkeye (spirits)]], a brand of liquor sold by Luxco * [[Hawkeye Transfer Company Warehouse]], listed on the National Register of Historic Places in Polk County, Iowa * [[Red Delicious]] or Hawkeye apple * [[Giora Epstein]] or Hawkeye (born 1938), retired colonel in the Israeli Air Force * [[Iowa Hawkeyes]], sports teams of the University of Iowa * [[Hawkeye Community College]], a community college, with its main campus located just outside Waterloo, Iowa == See also == * [[Hawk-Eye]], a tracking system used in cricket, Gaelic football, hurling, tennis and other sports * [[Hawk's Eye]], a member of the Amazon Trio in the ''Sailor Moon'' series * [[Hawk's eye]], a gemstone which is a variant of Tiger's Eye {{disambiguation}}
